thread.title: Recovery begins after heavy rain pummels N.C.

title: Recovery begins after heavy rain pummels N.C.
text:
Recovery begins after heavy rain pummels N.C. 6:46pm IST - 00:59
Tom Rouse, from Asheville, North Carolina, peruses the flooding in nearby Buncombe County while a family visiting from Tennessee say they'll likely stay another day in Rutherford County, North Carolina, because roads were blocked from trees and flooding. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).
Tom Rouse, from Asheville, North Carolina, peruses the flooding in nearby Buncombe County while a family visiting from Tennessee say they'll likely stay another day in Rutherford County, North Carolina, because roads were blocked from trees and flooding. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). //reut.rs/2J38QME
